title: Wedding Officiant Repeatedly Mistakes Groom's Name for Bride's Ex-Husband
description: A Reddit user recounted the time a wedding officiant repeatedly mistook the groom's name for the bride's ex-husband and allegedly wrote their script using artificial intelligence, leading to frustration among the bride, groom, and their guests.
content:
A wedding ceremony quickly turned awkward when the officiant repeatedly used the bride's ex-husband's name for the groom.
One of the wedding guests recalled the uncomfortable blunder in a post on Reddit's "Wedding Shaming" forum. They shamed the offi... [3463 chars]

title: James Woods warns AI could soon spell the 'end of human actors' in Hollywood
description: Oscar-nominated actor James Woods delivered a stark warning about artificial intelligence in Hollywood, saying it is not a passing fad but a force that could someday spell the end of human actors.
content:
Oscar-nominated actor James Woods delivered a stark warning about artificial intelligence in Hollywood, saying it is not a passing fad but a force that could someday spell the end of human actors.

content:

title: Humanoid robots face skepticism at Silicon Valley summit
description: The commercial boom in artificial intelligence has lit a spark under long-simmering visions to build humanoid robots.
content:
But the commercial boom in artificial intelligence has lit a spark under long-simmering visions to build humanoid robots that can move their mechanical bodies like humans and do things that people do.

title: Adobe AI Pirated Book Suit Adds Pressure to Copyright Fight Over AI Training
description: Adobe has become the latest technology heavyweight pulled into court over how artificial intelligence systems are built, facing a proposed class-action lawsuit that alleges the company trained an AI model using pirated books — including works written by the lead plaintiff. The Adobe AI pirated book suit intensifies a growing legal clash over whether AI Adobe AI pirated book suit alleges SlimLM was trained on copyrighted books without author consent.

title: ChatGPT maker offering $555,000 salary for ‘head of preparedness’ to head off threats to humanity from AI

content:

title: Incoming Call: AI expected to be core selling point as smartphone makers look to stand out amid rising hardware costs
description: Smartphones in 2026 will focus on artificial intelligence as a key feature. On-device generative AI capabilities like summarisation and image creation will drive software differentiation. AI-capable phone shipments are expected to grow rapidly in India. Samsung will prioritize privacy and affordability of AI services. Consumers are aware of AI features but concerned about privacy.

title: How AI Rewired the Automotive World in 2025
description: In 2025, artificial intelligence reshaped the automotive sector, accelerating electric vehicle adoption, advancing autonomous driving, and forcing governments and industries to confront the economic and social consequences of algorithm-driven mobility.
content:
